esprits.name: Glacivern the Absolute
esprits.description: Carved from ancient ice and rage, Glacivern freezes time itself before delivering a killing blow.

esprits.name: Blazeblob
esprits.description: A squishy little fire spirit that bounces with excitement and leaves singe marks wherever it goes.

esprits.name: Droozle
esprits.description: A plump little blob of seawater that jiggles when happy and splashes when startled.

esprits.name: Gloomb
esprits.description: A shadowy little blob that giggles quietly in the dark. No one's sure if it's friendly or just hungry.

esprits.name: Muddroot
esprits.description: A slow, sleepy mound of moss and mud that occasionally sprouts tiny leaves when content.

esprits.name: Shynix
esprits.description: Shynix twinkles faintly even in the dark. It's warm to the touch and smells faintly of sugar and stars.

esprits.name: Jelune
esprits.description: Always wobbling, never stoppingâ€”Jelune zips across puddles and gusts of wind like it was born to glide.

esprits.name: Solmane
esprits.description: A noble lion whose mane shimmers with golden light. It protects the weak and punishes darkness with blinding fury.

esprits.name: Gnawgrim
esprits.description: A feral predator cloaked in shadow and bone, it stalks with unnatural silence and strikes without mercy.

esprits.name: Packhorn
esprits.description: This loyal beast carries both gear and hope. Travelers say it always knows the safest path forward.

esprits.name: Brutusk
esprits.description: A towering brute born from molten earth. It charges without hesitation and leaves nothing standing in its path.

esprits.name: Dreadhorn
esprits.description: Its roar makes shadows tremble. Dreadhorn lives for battle and tears through enemies like paper.

esprits.name: Skargan
esprits.description: Covered in bark-like armor and moss, Skargan shrugs off blows and hits back even harder.
